Key: Er, well. I don't normally see you here.

I never imagined you enjoyed visiting parks
alone.
I thought a break would do me good.
There are times when I desire contemplation.

(I wonder what's on his mind. He might be
hiding his hardships from others.)

(...Oh! Could it be that his usual, strange
behavior is the result of his subconscious
dealing with high stress?)

Um, I don't want to bother you, so I'll be
on my way.

(Yeah, that must be it. Who doesn't have
stuff they need to work through? I'll
leave him be.)

Whew... Next month's adult convention...
I wonder if I'll be able to get time off...
